WRITING.TITLE: TIL As Of November 16, 2014, Your Bank Account Has Been Collateralized Against The Derivatives Debt. If The Banks Are Collapsed, Your Money Will Be Used To Pay Down The Derivatives Debt. Therefore, The Regulations Requiring That Your Money Be Insured By The FDIC Are No Longer In Effect!

WRITING.TEXT: Did you have enough money to get groceries?!
That reminds me of the movie Insidious.
Please update with the new info.
